name: Dark Maze Legends: Tilt to Escape The Room
name_original: Dark Maze Legends: Tilt to Escape The Room
description:
Do you love action/adventure games? If you're coordinated and ready to prove it then you'll love Dark Maze Legends!

Navigating a ball over a track is one thing; making it move down and over offset tracks using gravity is another. If you really want to prove your coordination and dexterity, though, then just wait until the obstacles start coming your way!

In the way that life can be, just as soon as you think you're safe, a new obstacle will be tossed your way to distract you and throw you off course. Are you ready to face them? Can you avoid the monsters and mayhem?

With multiple levels, this game will have you going for some time. Beat each level and move to the next new, exciting challenge.

Be careful, though. This game is addictive! You might not want to put it down! With its smooth, realistic gameplay and accelerometer-based steering you'll be moving with speed and style as you master each level and move on to the next.

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
